Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Grand
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue and Harlem: due to, street blockage near Harlem/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue and Harlem: due to, street blockage near Harlem/Grand.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #51 51st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 51st/Shields
ShortDescription: Eastbound 51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 47th, Wells and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Shields.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clinton due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clinton due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
